casebody.data:
Murphy et al., Appellants, v. Hafer, Appellee.

[Cite as Murphy v. Hafer (1985), 17 Ohio St. 3d 253.]

(No. 85-533 Decided June 12, 1985.) Thomas W. Fox, for appellants. Hanhart, Miller & Kyler and William A. Kyler, for appellee.

This cause on appeal from the court of appeals (case No. CA-1873) is reversed on authority of Schaffter v. Ward (1985), 17 Ohio St. 3d 79.

Sweeney, Locher, C. Brown and Douglas, JJ., concur. Celebrezze, C.J., Holmes and Wright, JJ., dissent.
